set_entity_threshold(10)
X = load_wn18()
model = ComplEx(batches_count=100, seed=555, epochs=1, k=50, loss=
    'multiclass_nll', loss_params={'margin': 5}, verbose=True, optimizer=
    'sgd', optimizer_params={'lr': 0.001})
model.fit(X['train'])
X_filter = np.concatenate((X['train'], X['valid'], X['test']), axis=0)
evaluate_performance(X['test'][::1000], model, X_filter, verbose=True,
    corrupt_side='s,o')
y = model.predict(X['test'][:1])
print(y)
reset_entity_threshold()
